title: How a Superstore and a Super Bike Took Decathlon-Ag2r to the Top of Pro Cycling
content:
Decathlon wants to become the next Nike or Specialized, and it's got equal ambitions for its cycling team: 'They want to win the world's biggest races in the next four years'

Read the full article at How a Superstore and a Super Bike Took Decathlon-Ag2r to the Top of Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
